about_the_game:
This game is not being worked on at the moment. It's on hold indefinitely

Colorspace is a fast paced singleplayer racing game where you have to destroy obstacles by changing to the right color.
Set in a neon minimalist environment, you must clear the levels as fast as possible to restore the communication signal
The best part is you don't have breaks!

Change colors
Switch color to match the obstacle's color and destroy it. Make your way to the end of the level and enjoy the colorful journey.



Slice obstacles
Destroy obstacles, avoid hazards and drive like crazy to reach the end of the level as fast as possible



No breaks!
You must go as fast as possible and you will because: YOU HAVE NO BREAKS!



Experience the levels in your style
Complete them as fast as possible, collect all the collectibles or try to clear the whole level of obstacles. Different goals for different playstyles.



Avoid hazards
Missiles, lasers, electricity fields, spikes. Everything is trying to get you killed!

Accessibility

Here is a list of the accessibility features in Colorspace
  • Choose the colors you want to play with
  • Patterns on obstacles to differentiate them
  • Tunable controller vibration
  • Tunable screenshake
